needs.title: Identifying Needs
needs.desc: With diverse financial infrastructures along the 'Belt and Road', SMEs often face challenges in cross-border settlements:
items: High Fees & Exchange Losses: SWIFT fees are high, and multi-currency exchanges incur volatile costs.
Long Settlement Cycles: Inter-bank clearing takes days, affecting capital turnover.
Trust & Compliance Risks: Risk of non-delivery or non-payment, especially with new partners. LCs are too costly for SMEs.

solution.title: PayFi Innovation & Solution
solution.desc: CSTPG leverages Conflux stablecoins and smart contracts to provide a low-cost, high-efficiency, trusted settlement solution.

point1.title: 1. Stablecoin as Medium
items: Innovation: Avoids exchange rate risks and high fees. Direct settlement in USD-pegged stablecoins.
Efficiency: Near-instant blockchain transactions vs. days for bank clearing.
Cost Reduction: Minimal transaction fees on Conflux Network.

point2.title: 2. Smart Contract Driven Escrow
items: Innovation: Decentralized escrow mechanism via smart contracts, replacing part of traditional LCs.
Trust: Funds locked until conditions met. Sellers ship with confidence knowing funds are secured.
Efficiency: Automatic fund release upon fulfillment (e.g., logistics update), no manual intervention.
